sentences.en: a decision made for purely political reasons
sentences.cn: 纯粹出于政治原因而作出的决定

sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual persons, places or events is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如与真人、真实地点或真实事件有雷同之处，纯属巧合。

sentences.en: Attendance on the course is purely voluntary.
sentences.cn: 听这门课纯粹是自愿的。

sentences.en: Bathrooms don't have to be purely functional.
sentences.cn: 浴室不必完全只为了实用。

sentences.en: I do it purely and simply for the money.
sentences.cn: 我纯粹是为了钱才干的。

sentences.en: I helped him purely and simply out of friendship.
sentences.cn: 我帮他纯粹是出于友情.

sentences.en: I realized he accepted my suggestion for purely sentimental reasons.
sentences.cn: 我意识到他接受我的建议纯粹出于感情上的缘故.

sentences.en: I saw the letter purely by chance.
sentences.cn: 我看见这封信纯属偶然。

sentences.en: It is purely for self - defence that we have produced some nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 我们搞一点核武器完全是为了 自卫.

sentences.en: Look at the matter purely from the scientific point of view.

sentences.cn: 我们的兴趣只有三分热度。

sentences.en: The building was closed purely on the grounds of safety.
sentences.cn: 那座大楼被关闭完全是出于安全考虑。

sentences.en: The chimney pots are purely ornamental.
sentences.cn: 这些烟囱管帽纯属装饰。

sentences.en: The evidence against him was purely circumstantial.
sentences.cn: 对他不利的这项证据完全是间接证据。

sentences.en: The items he makes are purely decorative.
sentences.cn: 他做的那些物品纯粹用于装饰.

sentences.en: The monarch's role is purely ceremonial.
sentences.cn: 君主纯粹是个礼仪职位.

sentences.en: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

sentences.en: This is a purely hypothetical situation.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是一种假设的情景.
